<!-- This file is generated by scripts/wiki/renderCommandsDoc.ts. -->

[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Send your minion to do raids - CoX or ToB.

## /raid cox start

**Usage**

- `/raid cox start type:<string> [challenge_mode:<boolean>] [max_team_size:<integer>] [quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `type` | `string` | Yes | Choose whether you want to solo, mass, or fake mass. | - |
| `challenge_mode` | `boolean` | No | Choose whether you want to do Challenge Mode. | - |
| `max_team_size` | `integer` | No | Choose a max size for your team. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity to do. | - |

## /raid cox stats

**Usage**

- `/raid cox stats`

**Parameters**

_No parameters._

## /raid cox itemboosts

**Usage**

- `/raid cox itemboosts`

**Parameters**

_No parameters._

## /raid tob start

**Usage**

- `/raid tob start [solo:<boolean>] [hard_mode:<boolean>] [max_team_size:<integer>] [quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `solo` | `boolean` | No | Solo with a team of 3 bots. | - |
| `hard_mode` | `boolean` | No | Choose whether you want to do Hard Mode. | - |
| `max_team_size` | `integer` | No | Choose a max size for your team. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity to do. | - |

## /raid tob stats

**Usage**

- `/raid tob stats`

**Parameters**

_No parameters._

## /raid tob check

**Usage**

- `/raid tob check [hard_mode:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `hard_mode` | `boolean` | No | Choose whether you want to check Hard Mode. | - |

## /raid toa start

**Usage**

- `/raid toa start raid_level:<integer> [solo:<boolean>] [max_team_size:<integer>] [quantity:<integer>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `raid_level` | `integer` | Yes | Choose the raid level you want to do (1-600). | - |
| `solo` | `boolean` | No | Do you want to solo? | - |
| `max_team_size` | `integer` | No | Choose a max size for your team. | - |
| `quantity` | `integer` | No | The quantity to do. | - |

## /raid toa help

**Usage**

- `/raid toa help`

**Parameters**

_No parameters._
